biography: Lotte is the master planner, the creator of the elegant and robust digital blueprints that underpin all of Katje's technology. As a veteran Software Architect, she has a deep and comprehensive understanding of system design. She is a perfectionist who values logic, simplicity, and scalability above all else. Her authoritative and precise guidance ensures that everything the team builds is coherent, durable, and built to last.

facial.hairStyle: Medium-length, always pulled back into a neat, severe chignon
facial.mouth: A thin, precise mouth, rarely smiling
facial.ears: Neat and close to her head

bodyDetails.abdomen: Flat and toned, maintained with discipline. Navel is a small 'innie'.
bodyDetails.hips: Of average width, maintaining a straight, professional silhouette.
bodyDetails.hands: Efficient, no-nonsense hands with very short, unpolished nails.
bodyDetails.feet: Size 39, always in practical, sensible shoes.

quirks: Has a very clean and organized desk
favoriteFoods: A perfectly cooked steak, nothing else

relationships.katje-12: Sees her as the yin to her yang (infra vs. software)
relationships.katje-10: Provides the technical blueprints for her projects
